job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen, zodat deze voldoet aan de behoeften van onze analyse- en productteams.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions the development and optimization of language model implementations, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of data engineering: building and maintaining data pipelines for collection, storage, processing, and analysis.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met Digital Product Teams om technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration on designing technical solutions for implementing digital products, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Improving data quality and processing efficiency through implementing technologies and best practices is a software development activity within the data context.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt samen met zowel Technische Platform Teams als Digital Product Teams
Bieden van technische ondersteuning en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes the development and optimization of 'taalmodellen' (language models), a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer. While Data Engineering tasks are present, the specialization in LLMs and their application in product development points towards the GenAI Engineer profile.
